qas.question: In what year was salt water taffy conceived?
Who was the creator of salt water taffy?
What happened to David Bradley's shop that led to the creation of salt water taffy?

answers.text: Bradley's shop was flooded after a major storm

qas.question: Who did Bradley sell salt water taffy to for the first time?
Where did the water come from for the creation of the first salt water taffy?

context: In <a0_0>1883<a0_0/>, salt water taffy was conceived in Atlantic City by <a1_0>David Bradley<a1_0/>. The traditional story is that <a2_0>Bradley's shop was flooded after a major storm<a2_0/>, soaking his taffy with salty <a4_0>Atlantic Ocean<a4_0/> water. He sold some "salt water taffy" to <a3_0>a girl<a3_0/>, who proudly walked down to the beach to show her friends. Bradley's mother was in the back of the store when the sale was made, and loved the name, and so salt water taffy was born.
